Summary: I Saw a ufo in the ski and four small objects came out of the back of it and went around it and went of in different directions
trends: There have been no other sightings in Agusta
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI don't know what the vessel looked like but four small vehicles came out of the back and went of in different directions.After about ten minutes they came back and went back the way they came back toward the bomb plant.I was going to pick up my girlfrind and i was going from Olar to Barnwel south carolina when i saw an object in the ski.Itwas a large object and it made no noise. Foure smaller objects came out of the back of the object and went around the object and went of in four different directions.In aBOUT TEN to fifteen minutes they came back.Then it went back the way it came Toward tha bomb plant.I felt that it was ufo and i went to get my mother to witness the object but i don't know if she saw it or not,i don't remember.
